price: 38. Tout ce que cela comporte de mauvais est exécré de ton Seigneur.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
